help:
```!create = Create a new parteh.
usage: !create [name of parteh]

!add = Add a role in the parteh.
usage: !add [name of role]

!disband = Destroy teh parteh (Boss-only command) muehuehuehuehue. :japanese_goblin:
usage: !disband

!ditch = Use the ditch-ditch powers to shamelessly leave the parteh.
usage: !ditch

!info = Describe the parteh of despair (Boss-only command) muehuehue.
usage: !info [your last will]
example: !info GMC Slot 3 3 pm ST | 9 pm ID | 10 pm PH

!invite = Invite a hueman in the parteh.
sage: !invite [name of role] [name of hueman]

!join = Join the parteh.
usage: !join [name of role]

!kick = Shamelessly kick the hueman out of the parteh.
usage: !kick [name of hueman]

!note = Adds your last will beside your name muehuehue.
usage: !note [your last will]
example: !note a pruo hp that can solo ET

!party = Enter a preset party roster cuz of laziness (Boss-only command)
usage 1: !party default = Creates a party roster with the default roles
usage2: !party wipe = Wipes the party roster clean

!remove = Remove a role in the parteh. Also removes the hueman assigned to the role, if there's any.
usage: !remove [name of role]

!tag = Tags all huemans in the parteh roster
usage: !tag

!time = Sets the time of despair. (Boss-only command) (Point of reference is at GMT+0)
usage: !time [hh:mm]

!view = View current parteh list.
usage: !view```
